name: EdgesetBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Edgeset Marketing provides you with up to date news and information about what's happening in the world of Motorsports, eSports, and sports business! Be sure to enable the companion skill, Edgeset Marketing for more interactive content from the Edge Network!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
